page.title: 10Entertainment In Newburgh
page.content: In Newburgh there are hotels, a public hall and church hall which can be used for entertaining people.Many people however, choose to go to Aberdeen where there are cinemas and a theatre. Aberdeen also has many restaurants which serve a wide and varied cuisine. In the hotels in Newburgh you can hold various functions such as weddings, dances and parties.Discos for children are held in the village hall every month.These are split into two age groups the first being for the younger children up to the age of 9 the second for those in the age group 10 to 16. For the older people in the village there is the luncheon club where they can have their lunch and occasionally be entertained by groups of children from the local school.Ellon is a good centre for entertainment.There are hotels and a community centre.
